dmca.title: Google DMCA - Joanasworld
dmca.body:
(650) 963-3255, Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

#1 The copyrighted work at issue is "Joana's 1-70 Horde Leveling Guide" by Paul M. Lucas. This guide is text material detailing the routes and techniques I employ to achieve world record time to move my character from the start [level 1] to the end [level 70] in the popular online game World of Warcraft.

#2 The Infringing websites are:
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3603136/Joana_s_Horde_Leveling_Guide_1-70___
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3596464/Joanas_1-60_Horde_Leveling_Guide_PDF
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3606718/Joana_s_Horde_Leveling_Guide.zip

The search queries can be:
joana
Joana's horde leveling guide
Joana's 1-70 leveling guide
Joana's 1-70 horde
Joana guide
Joana's guide
1-70 leveling guide
horde leveling guide
1-70 horde guide
leveling guide 1-70
Joana's leveling guide
leveling guide joana


#3 Here is a copyright certificate scan: http://www.joanasworld.com/joana_guide_copyright.jpg
And my homepage where I am selling it at http://www.joanasworld.com/

#4 My Contact Information:
Paul M. Lucas
P.O. Box 542
Barberton, Ohio 44203-4311
United States

My Email: joana@joanasworld.com

#5 I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by my registered copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is infringed.

Paul M. Lucas
